    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      Override from ActionListener. If the Admin accepts a submitted application, it will appear in the Framework class and be added to Catalog.txt and Substitute.txt. If it is rejected, it will be added to the Substitute.txt.
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
      Parameters:
